fields.headline: The measure
fields.bodyText: Going up The 6am kids Up on the hill, just beyond Lost Vagueness. Every year, we love you more and more, Glasto folk French Connection Revelation! There is wheat among the chav Alice bands at Glastonbury Turn dirty hair into a Miuccia-esque style statement Pale silver Anna W's favoured colour for eveningwear. Fact Retro luggage Makes waiting at the airport carousel so much more glamorous. Prada's floral printed range is da biz; Globetrotter's solid chunkiness a close second Going down Snug cardigans Too twee. You need a little jacket, or a mannish cardie Short shorts On court or off, pirate shorts are so much hotter than hotpants Trashy wedding outfits White jeans may be back, but Liz Hurley's diamanté knickers will never be right. This summer, in fact, we're wearing hats Bootleg jeans Puh-leeze! What are you, a Sloaney yummy mummy? It's all about skinny drainpipes now, obviously Brad's blond hair Proof indeed there was only ever one hairstyle in that marriage
